message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I think you'd be interested in. I'm asking for $100 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down to $95, but I can't go any lower than that.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thank you for the revised offer. I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $95. I'd be willing to go up to $92, but that's as high as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good price, but $92 just isn't enough for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers - $93.50. This is my final offer, let me know if you're interested.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $93.50 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $91, but that's the absolute maximum I can afford. Would you be willing to consider that?
